name: sf_dashboard
description: This project implements a comprehensive data pipeline for San Francisco municipal data, facilitating the flow from CSV files and Google Sheets into a structured Postgres database with landing, staging, and core layers, followed by reverse ETL back to Google Sheets for analysis and reporting.

scripts.review:preflight: git diff --cached --name-only --diff-filter=d | grep -E '\.(js|jsx|ts|tsx|json|yaml|yml|md)$' | xargs --no-run-if-empty pnpm -s verify:precommit
scripts.report:staged: mkdir -p artifacts && (echo "# Change Report (STAGED)"; echo; echo "## Diff Summary"; echo '```text'; git diff --staged --stat || true; echo '```'; echo; echo "## Patch"; echo '```diff'; git -c color.ui=always --no-pager diff --staged -- . ':(exclude)*.png' ':(exclude)*.jpg' ':(exclude)*.jpeg' ':(exclude)*.gif' ':(exclude)*.lock' || true; echo '```'; echo; echo "## Lint"; echo '```text'; pnpm -s lint || true; echo '```'; echo; echo "## Typecheck"; echo '```text'; pnpm -s typecheck || true; echo '```'; echo; echo "## Tests"; echo '```text'; pnpm -s test || true; echo '```'; echo; echo "## OpenAPI"; echo '```text'; pnpm -s openapi:lint || true; pnpm -s openapi:check || true; echo '```'; echo; echo "## Security"; echo '```text'; pnpm -s secret-scan || true; echo '```') > artifacts/report-staged.md && echo '✅ artifacts/report-staged.md'
scripts.report:full: mkdir -p artifacts && (echo "# Change Report (FULL)"; echo; echo "## Diff Summary"; echo '```text'; git diff --stat || true; echo '```'; echo; echo "## Patch"; echo '```diff'; git -c color.ui=always --no-pager diff -- . ':(exclude)*.png' ':(exclude)*.jpg' ':(exclude)*.jpeg' ':(exclude)*.gif' ':(exclude)*.lock' || true; echo '```'; echo; echo "## Lint"; echo '```text'; pnpm -s lint || true; echo '```'; echo; echo "## Typecheck"; echo '```text'; pnpm -s typecheck || true; echo '```'; echo; echo "## Tests"; echo '```text'; pnpm -s test:all || pnpm -s test || true; echo '```'; echo; echo "## OpenAPI"; echo '```text'; pnpm -s openapi:lint || true; pnpm -s openapi:check || true; echo '```'; echo; echo "## Security"; echo '```text'; pnpm -s secret-scan || true; echo '```') > artifacts/report-full.md && echo '✅ artifacts/report-full.md'
scripts.test:all: pnpm -s test:unit && pnpm -s test:contracts && pnpm -s test:integration && pnpm -s test:arch
scripts.ci:fast: pnpm -s typecheck && pnpm -s lint:ci && pnpm -s test
scripts.ci:verify: pnpm -s typecheck && pnpm -s lint:ci && pnpm -s test:all && pnpm -s openapi:lint:ci && pnpm -s openapi:check && pnpm -s secret-scan && pnpm -s build
scripts.registry:socrata:sf:rebuild: pnpm run registry:socrata:sf:build && pnpm run registry:socrata:sf:validate
scripts.registry:arcgis:example: node scripts/build-arcgis-index.mjs --portal=https://www.arcgis.com --out=municipalities/ARCGIS/directory.arcgis.json --query=type:("Feature Service" OR "Feature Layer") AND owner:esri
scripts.registry:refresh: npm run registry:socrata:sf && npm run registry:socrata:detroit
scripts.registry:all: npm run registry:refresh && npm run registry:merge && npm run registry:load:pg
scripts.secret-scan: sh -c 'command -v gitleaks >/dev/null 2>&1 && gitleaks detect --no-git --redact -c .gitleaks.toml || (echo "gitleaks not found. Install: brew install gitleaks" >&2; exit 1)'
scripts.spec:all: pnpm -s spec:lint && pnpm -s spec:check-types && pnpm -s spec:tsd
scripts.verify:precommit: pnpm -s format:check && pnpm -s lint:changed && node scripts/check-review-files.mjs && node scripts/scan-staged-for-todos.mjs
